div.p: My name's Arun and I'm a Trainee Architect. I’ve spent the last year doing a couple of work experiences and that sort of applies what I’ve learnt at Uni
so I do all the technical drawings and I pitch ideas about the urban environment. There’s a lot of research involved so you’re looking
to previous architects, you draw from things that you think are successful in their projects, you may apply it to your own but yeah I think
that’s pretty much what we do is sort of design urban spaces.
